nse_queries.observation: If the narrative mentions the sku count as 2.0 on page 23 but the Table/another section reflects 5.0 on page 26, kindly reconcile the factual contradiction and provide revised draft of the table along with confirmation that the same shall be updated in prospectus

On page no. 10 to 26, it is mentioned utilities for manufacturing. Kindly clarify by: (a) providing the source of power and water (State grid vs Captive vs Private supply); (b) detailing the dependency risk (₹ impact of 1-day outage as % of EBITDA); (c) confirming availability of requisite NOCs/permits for water extraction/discharge. Provide revised draft.

[Critical - Operational] Throughout the DRHP (specifically on Page 21), the term "aggregate effective installed capacity" is used without providing the actual aggregate effective installed capacity in MW/KL/Units (as applicable) for the relevant manufacturing facilities as of the end of the relevant fiscal year/period. Provide the specific numeric value for the aggregate effective installed capacity for each unit and in aggregate for the last three fiscal years and the stub period ending December 2024. Confirm that the revised disclosure shall be updated in the Prospectus. Provide revised draft.

[Critical - Operational] The DRHP on Page 157 details a "Polyurethane (PU) Foam Moulding Process" which includes steps like "Raw Material Receipt & Inspection", "RM Storage (FIFO, 6 Months)", "Pouring (PU Release Agent Machine)", and "Curing". However, there is no explicit mention or quantification of R&D spend related to the development or optimization of these processes, nor is there any data on QA certifications versus actual inspection/rejection rates for the raw materials (ISO 434 and Polyol 966) or the finished PU moulded foam components. This lack of detail prevents an assessment of operational efficiency and quality control. Please provide the following for the last three financial years and the stub period ending December 2024: (a) R&D spend as a percentage of revenue, (b) details of QA certifications held, and (c) actual inspection/rejection rates for raw materials and finished goods. Confirm that the revised disclosure shall be updated in the Prospectus. Provide revised draft.
nse_queries.regulation_ref: ICDR Regulations - Disclosure Requirements for Financial Information

nse_queries.observation: [Critical - Operational] Page 22 states that raw materials are primarily transported to Units and from one unit to another unit by road. The table on Page 22 presents "Domestic raw material" and "Imported raw material" costs, but does not provide any information on the associated logistics costs, nor does it differentiate between in-house and outsourced transportation for these materials. This omission prevents an assessment of the logistics mechanism and its cost efficiency. Please provide a breakdown of logistics costs associated with raw material procurement and inter-unit transfer for the periods presented in the table on Page 22, and quantify the ratio of in-house versus outsourced logistics costs. Provide revised draft...

[Critical - Operational] Throughout the Chapter (specifically on Page(s) 129), the disclosure on employee attrition presents a three-month period ended June 30, 2025, with a calculated attrition rate of "-". This is inconsistent with the provided data for the financial years ended March 31, 2025, 2024, and 2023, which show attrition rates of "5.8%", "2.38%", and "2.48%" respectively. The absence of a calculated attrition rate for the most recent stub period requires clarification and reconciliation with the preceding financial years. Provide revised draft...

[Critical - Operational] Throughout the DRHP (specifically on Page 29), the Company discloses "Fire and Special Perils" insurance for its Foamtech units. However, the "Period of Insurance" for policy number 1536001124010000007 is listed as "27/3/2025" to "26/3/2026". This period extends beyond the current fiscal year ending March 31, 2025, and into the stub period ending December 31, 2024. Please clarify the exact coverage period for the stub period and reconcile this with the stated policy end date. Provide revised draft...

On page no. 15, it is mentioned CSR activities. Kindly confirm whether the allocated amount was expended and specify the quantum thereof for the past three fiscal years. Further, provide a revised draft along with confirmation that the same will be updated in prospectus

[Critical - Operational] The DRHP mentions that "The manner of calculation and presentation of some of the financial and operational performance indicators included in this Draft Red Herring Prospectus, some of which have not been derived from the Restated Financial Information, and the assumptions and estimates used in such calculations, may vary from that used by other companies in India and other jurisdictions." (Page 144). This statement lacks specificity regarding which indicators are not derived from Restated Financial Information and the potential impact of these variations. Please provide a detailed list of all financial and operational performance indicators that are not derived from the Restated Financial Information, along with the specific methodologies and assumptions used for their calculation, and a quantitative assessment of any potential divergence from industry norms. Confirm that the revised disclosure shall be updated in the Prospectus. Provide revised draft.
nse_queries.regulation_ref: ICDR Regulations - Disclosure Requirements for Risk Factors

nse_queries.observation: On page no. 1, it is mentioned the disclosure regarding subsidiary rationale. Kindly clarify the rationale for the existing corporate structure and the reasons for not undertaking business operations directly through the Issuer Company. Further, provide a revised draft along with confirmation.

In “Our Business” chapter- It is observed that the Company has made use of superlative words / adjectives like the disclosure regarding superlative evidence etc. without citing the source and basis of the same as per the instructions mentioned in Schedule VI of the SEBI (ICDR) Regulations 2018 in relation to forward-looking statements. Kindly provide the source/basis of all such statements/claims. Also include these bases in the Material Documents Chapter available for inspection. If not, kindly review and revise the same. Further, the above mentioned points are merely indicative in nature, the Merchant banker shall vet the offer document and ensure that there are no disclosures which are advertising statements and marketing statement and if there are any it shall be either be drafted in a neutral language or provide a basis for the same or removed, to that end, kindly provide a draft along with a confirmation the same shall be placed at the time of prospectus as applicable
nse_queries.regulation_ref: ICDR Regulations, Schedule VI - Forward-Looking Statements

nse_queries.observation: On page no. 6, it is mentioned the disclosure regarding logistics mechanism audit. On page no. 7, quality assurance processes are discussed. Kindly elaborate on the Company’s quality assurance and control mechanisms. If the Company lacks in-house quality certifications, kindly provide the rationale and consider the inclusion of a risk factor. Further, provide a revised draft along with confirmation.

On page no. 1, it is mentioned the disclosure regarding management experience individual. As per drafting norms, kindly provide individual years of experience, specific domain expertise, and prior successful track record for each Key Managerial Personnel (KMP). Avoid generic aggregation. Provide revised draft and confirmation.

[Critical - Operational] Throughout the Chapter (specifically on Page 161), the disclosure extensively uses industrial jargon such as "compound," "mixing mills," "rollers," "Work Instructions," "machine settings," "steel rule," "7-drum belt conveyor," "power press," "EVA buns," "band saw machine," "cutting list," "Vernier callipers," "weighing scale," "Shore A hardness," "hardness tester," "Customer-Specific Requirements (CSR)," "standard packing list," "Control Plan," and "Q-Alert criteria." While these terms are industry-specific, their frequent and unelaborated use without a glossary or clear definition within the DRHP may hinder comprehension for a general investor. Provide a glossary of all industrial/technical terms used throughout the DRHP. Confirm that the revised disclosure shall be updated in the Prospectus. Provide revised draft.
nse_queries.regulation_ref: ICDR Regulations - Disclosure Requirements for Risk Factors
